actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution providing for an investigation of charges against the Vice President.

summary.text: Directs the Speaker to instruct an appropriate committee of the House of Representatives to conduct an investigation to determine if alleged improprieties by Vice President Spiro T. Agnew pertain to the period of his tenure in office. Urges the Attorney General of the United States to consult with and submit to such committee any information, documents, investigative reports, and other material which would be relevant to making such determination.

titles.title: Resolution providing for an investigation of charges against the Vice President.
